Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [Camp].[InsertUsersFromStaging] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript

Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE Camp.usp_addapps @appname VARCHAR(50) ,@iconurl NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@appurl NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@description NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@Section_id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; WITH Defaults AS ( SELECT ac.app_id, ac.app_name, ac.icon_url, ac.app_url, ac.description, ac.is_default, s.section_id, s.section_name FROM camp.App_Catalog AS ac
JOIN camp.Section AS s ON s.section_id = ac.section_id
WHERE s.section_id = 2 ), UserApps AS ( SELECT ac.app_id, ac.app_name, ac.icon_url, ac.app_url, ac.description, ac.is_default, s.section_id, s.section_name FROM camp.App_Catalog AS ac JOIN camp.Section AS s ON s.section_id = ac.section_id JOIN camp.User_AppSection_Mapping AS am ON ac.app_id = am.app_id WHERE am.is_active = 1 AND am.user_id = @user_id ) SELECT * FROM Defaults AS d WHERE @section_id = '' OR @section_id = 2
UNION
SELECT * FROM UserApps AS u WHERE @section_id = '' OR u.section_id = @section_id; END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- Select the notifications for the user SELECT notification_id, Message, is_read, created_at FROM Notifications WHERE user_id = @UserID ORDER BY created_at DESC;
END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT ac.app_id, ac.app_name, ac.icon_url, ac.app_url, ac.description, ac.is_default, s.section_name, CASE WHEN ac.section_id = 2 OR am.is_active = 1 AND am.user_id = @user_id THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsAdded FROM camp.App_Catalog AS ac
JOIN camp.Section AS s ON s.section_id = ac.section_id
LEFT JOIN camp.User_AppSection_Mapping AS am ON ac.app_id = am.app_id AND am.user_id = @user_id
WHERE ac.is_active = 1
ORDER BY IsAdded,s.section_name; END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [Camp].[usp_getappcatalog] @user_id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT [section_id] ,[section_name] FROM [Camp].[Section] where is_active =1 END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [Camp].[usp_GetSectionlistFordropdown]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
WITH Defaults AS ( SELECT s.section_id, s.section_name FROM Camp.Section AS s WHERE s.section_id IN (1, 2) ), UserApps AS ( SELECT DISTINCT s.section_id, s.section_name FROM camp.App_Catalog AS ac
JOIN camp.Section AS s ON s.section_id = ac.section_id
JOIN camp.User_AppSection_Mapping AS am ON ac.app_id = am.app_id
WHERE am.is_active = 1 AND s.is_active = 1 AND am.user_id = @user_id ) SELECT section_id, section_name FROM Defaults
UNION
SELECT section_id, section_name FROM UserApps AS u
ORDER BY section_name END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [Camp].[usp_GetSectionsForMenuBar] @user_id INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT u.[user_id] AS [UserID] ,u.emp_id AS [EmployeeID] ,u.full_name AS [EmployeeName] ,u.email AS [Email] ,d.[name] AS [DepartmentName] ,ds.[title] AS [Designation] ,m.emp_id AS [ManagerID] ,m.email AS [ManagerEmail] ,m.[full_name] AS [ManagerName] FROM Camp.[User] AS u
JOIN Camp.User_Role_Mapping AS ur ON u.[user_id] = ur.[user_id]
JOIN Camp.[User] AS m ON u.manager_id = m.[user_id]
JOIN Camp.Department AS d ON u.department_id = D.department_id
JOIN Camp.Designation AS ds ON u.designation_id = ds.designation_id
WHERE u.email = @email; END;
